articles.description: Pep Guardiola says Manchester City - who are on the joint worst run of form in the Premier League after a sixth defeat in eight games - 'have to find a way' to win again.
articles.title: Man City lose to Aston Villa: Pep Guardiola says struggling champions 'have to find a way' to win again

articles.description: A tearful Luke Littler almost hits a nine-darter as he starts his bid for the PDC World Championship title with a dramatic 3-1 win over Ryan Meikle.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship: Luke Littler almost hits nine-darter in opening win

articles.description: After watching Gabriel Jesus score a hat-trick against Crystal Palace in midweek, Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta says the striker has rediscovered his best form.
articles.title: 'I know I can score' - Is Gabriel Jesus the answer to Arsenal's striker dilemma?

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says he is "pretty worried" about Bukayo Saka after the England winger went off injured against Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Arsenal: Mikel Arteta 'pretty worried' about Bukayo Saka injury against Crystal Palace

articles.description: Lindsey Vonn marks her World Cup return after more than five years away from the sport with an impressive 14th place in the Super G at St Moritz.
articles.title: Lindsey Vonn impresses on World Cup return after coming out of retirement

articles.description: Southampton appoint ex-Roma boss Ivan Juric as their new manager on an 18-month deal.
